metadata.title: Indian Village Woman Making Food on Stone Stove - Real Rajasthani Life HD Video
metadata.description: In this video, we visit the Pushkar Mela in Rajasthan to witness a local woman preparing traditional rotis on a stone stove. The video provides a glimpse into the authentic rural life and culinary practices of Rajasthani village women.

transcription_hindi: [00:00:01.000] चलिए दोस्तों चलते हैं पुष्कर मेले जहाँ पर एक राजस्थानी गाँव की औरत रोटियां बना रही है।
[00:00:13.000] लोई तैयार करना और उसे बेलना।
[00:00:36.000] तैयार रोटी को गर्म तवे पर रखना।
[00:00:53.000] रोटी को बेलने और पकाने की प्रक्रिया जारी है।
[00:01:31.000] लोई बनाना और उसे सूखे आटे में लपेटना।
[00:01:42.000] तैयार रोटियों को एक के ऊपर एक रखना।
[00:03:11.000] रोटियों को तवे पर अच्छी तरह से सेंकना।
transcription_english: [00:00:01.000] Friends, let's head to the Pushkar Mela where a Rajasthani village woman is making rotis.
[00:00:07.000] Let's see how she prepares the rotis.
[00:00:13.000] Preparing the dough ball and starting to roll it.
[00:00:36.000] Placing the rolled roti onto the hot griddle.
[00:00:44.000] Scenes from the fair including a camel cart.
[00:00:53.000] The process of rolling and cooking the rotis continues.
[00:01:21.000] Flipping the roti on the griddle for even cooking.
[00:01:31.000] Shaping a new dough ball and coating it with dry flour.
[00:01:42.000] Stacking the freshly prepared rotis together.
[00:01:55.000] The roti roasting perfectly on the griddle.
[00:02:04.000] Preparing another batch of dough balls.
[00:02:30.000] Skillfully shaping the dough into perfect circles.
[00:03:11.000] Ensuring the rotis are well-roasted on the heat.
[00:04:10.000] An overview of the entire roti-making process.
